title: Custom padding for convolutions
body_html: For the moment it looks like TF only supports VALID or SAME convolutions ? Is there a clever work around to do custom padding convolutions like having a padding of length h defined by the user like in this neon implementation ? Is implementing it in the pipeline ?

body: For the moment it looks like TF only supports VALID or SAME convolutions ? Is there a clever work around to do custom padding convolutions like having a padding of length h defined by the user like in this [neon implementation](http://neon.nervanasys.com/docs/latest/generated/neon.layers.layer.Conv.html) ? Is implementing it in the pipeline ?
